body.p: A task is an action corresponding to a technical intervention related to a ticket.
A task can have a category (see ).
A task can be private or public.

A private task is only visible: :
its editor
user to whom the task was assigned
users with the right See assigned tickets (personnal + group associated).
The length allows the documentation by the technician for the actual processing of the task, most notably in statistics or billings.

Finally, a task is schedulable. Once defined, the start date, duration or end date input, the task will appear on planning calendar of the technician to whom the task was assigned. The status can report the state of the task (Information, To do, Done).
body.note: When planning a task, it is possible to check the availability of the technician. The icon opens a new window with a quick summary of open periods.
It is possible to set a reminder for the task before it starts by defining a time interval for the reminder. Notifications must be enabled (see ).
